stranger.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone that you do not know
stranger.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Children must not talk to strangers.
Julie finds it easy to speak to complete strangers.
stranger.translation[0].definitions[1].d: someone in a new and unfamiliar place
stranger.translation[0].definitions[1].e: ‘Where’s the station?’ ‘Sorry, I’m a stranger here myself.’
stranger.translation[0].note_box[0].sect: Really, I don't know why I'm revealing all this to a complete stranger.
I hadn't seen him for so long that he seemed like a virtual stranger.
Do not give your camera to a passing stranger and ask him to take a picture of you.
She never knew who the mysterious stranger was who had helped her that night.
